title: DJ Sona unavaible
body:
Hei guys this post is to ask about DJ {{champion:37}} skin  .
I had saved RP to buy her for a while now. I understand she will be 25% disccount at release  right?
I see the skin is there now in patch 5.4 and it says UNAVAIBLE.
Why isn't she avaible for purchase yet? I waited kind of long and I'm being frustrated that I cant play her.
Does anyone know when she will be avaible for purchase?

I will really apreciate any answer from you guys. My RP is siting there for so long waiting for the skin...

replies.body: Patch notes just say she'll be released in 5.4, not that it will be at the start of 5.4
My theory, riot went home for the night and are waiting until they come back to work in the morning to release it in case anything bad happens when they do, either way just wait a while longer
hmmm thats a good theory :D . I hope they won't make us wait any longer now. I feel like every minute kills me :P
You can play sona still but yeah this is ridiculous they said in the Q&A she will be out "really really really soon!" and "shes coming in hot!" she better be available today! D:
Omg if they released her portrait and announced her release but are really just "getting the stage ready" I'm gonna have to punt a small baby animal into the nearest highway XD
xD lel ! I feel exactly the same lvl of frustration that you described
I know I hope too!! Im so excited about this skin and I payed from before to buy her . I'm just so unpatient to play her.

Try again next week. kiddo. The never release for purchase the same day as the patch their files come with. Riot has enough trouble keeping the game functioning with the rest of the changes the patch made. They unlock new skins after the patch has successfully been distributed to a large fraction of the community.

No one cares that you waited. It unlocks when they unlock it. My guess would be a minimum of 3 days from now, based on skin releases in the past. 

Chill out. You'll survive without the skin for another week.
